00048 char code node_name[] = "SCS-520";
00049 
00050 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00051 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00052 
00053 sbit UNI_BIP = P0 ^ 3;          // Unipolar/bipolar switch
00054 sbit SR_CLOCK = P0 ^ 4;         // Shift register clock
00055 sbit SR_STROBE = P0 ^ 5;        // Storage register clock
00056 sbit SR_DATA = P0 ^ 6;          // Serial data
00057 sbit SR_DATAIN = P0 ^ 7;        // Serial data input
00058 
00059 bit gain_flag;                  // set when new gains need to be set
00060 
00061 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00062 
00063 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00064 
00065 struct {
00066    float adc[8];
00067    float dac0, dac1;
00068    unsigned char p1;
00069    unsigned char adc_average;   // average 2^(adc_average+4)
00070    unsigned char range[8];      // see below
00071    char ofs[8];                 // channel offset in mV
00072    char gain[8];                // channel gain
00073 //##   char bip_ofs[8];             // bipolar offset in 10mV
00074    unsigned char cur_mode;      // current bit for each channel
00075 } idata user_data;
00076 
00077 /* Usage of range:
00078 
00079  Bipol.     Ext.  PGA    Gain        Full Range
00080 
00081   Bit2      Bit1 Bit0  
00082 
00083    0         0    0         1         0 -   10V
00084    0         0    1        10         0 -    1V
00085    0         1    0       100         0 -  0.1V
00086    0         1    1      1000         0 - 0.01V
00087 
00088    1         0    0         1      -10V -   10V
00089    1         0    1        10       -1V -    1V
00090    1         1    0       100     -0.1V -  0.1V
00091    1         1    1      1000    -0.01V - 0.01V
00092 */
00093

00160   Application specific init and inout/output routines

00164 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00165 void write_gain(void) reentrant;
00166 
00167 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00168 
00169 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00170 
00171 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00172 {
00173    unsigned char i;
00174 
00175    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00176    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00177    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC 
00178 
00179    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference
00180    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00181    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00182 
00183    /* push-pull:
00184       P0.0    TX
00185       P0.1
00186       P0.2
00187       P0.3
00188 
00189       P0.4    SR_CLOCK
00190       P0.5    SR_STROBE
00191       P0.6    SR_DATA 
00192       P0.7
00193     */
00194    //PRT0CF = 0x71;
00195    PRT0CF = 0x41;
00196 
00197    /* P1 push-pull if UDN2981 driver installed, open drain if input */
00198    PRT1CF = 0xFF;
00199 
00200    /* initial EEPROM value */
00201    if (init) {
00202       user_data.adc_average = 8;
00203       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00204          user_data.range[i] = 0;
00205          user_data.ofs[i] = 0;
00206 //##         user_data.bip_ofs[i] = 0;
00207       }
00208       user_data.dac0 = 0;
00209       user_data.dac1 = 0;
00210       user_data.p1 = 0xff;
00211    }
00212 
00213    /* write P1, DACs and UNI_BIP */
00214    user_write(8);
00215    user_write(9);
00216    user_write(10);
00217    user_write(12);
00218 
00219    /* write gains and read current mode */
00220    write_gain();
00221 }
00222 
00223 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00224 
00225 #pragma NOAREGS
00226 
00227 void write_gain(void) reentrant
00228 {
00229    unsigned char i, d;
00230 
00231    SR_STROBE = 0;
00232    SR_CLOCK = 0;
00233    SR_DATAIN = 1;
00234    d = 0;
00235 
00236    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00237       if (!SR_DATAIN)
00238          d |= (1 << (i * 2));
00239 
00240       SR_DATA = ((user_data.range[3 - i] & 0x02) > 0);  // first bit ext. PGA
00241       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00242       delay_us(10);
00243       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00244       delay_us(10);
00245 
00246       if (!SR_DATAIN)
00247          d |= (1 << (i * 2 + 1));
00248 
00249       SR_DATA = ((user_data.range[3 - i] & 0x01) > 0);  // second bit ext. PGA
00250       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00251       delay_us(10);
00252       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00253       delay_us(10);
00254    }
00255 
00256    user_data.cur_mode = d;
00257 
00258    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00259       SR_DATA = ((user_data.range[7 - i] & 0x02) > 0);  // first bit ext. PGA
00260       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00261       delay_us(10);
00262       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00263       delay_us(10);
00264 
00265       SR_DATA = ((user_data.range[7 - i] & 0x01) > 0);  // second bit ext. PGA
00266       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00267       delay_us(10);
00268       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00269       delay_us(10);
00270    }
00271 
00272    /* strobe for output and next input */
00273    SR_DATA = 0;
00274    SR_STROBE = 1;
00275    delay_us(10);
00276    SR_STROBE = 0;
00277    delay_us(10);
00278 }
00279 
00280 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00281 {
00282    unsigned char i;
00283    unsigned short d;
00284 
00285    switch (index) {
00286    case 8:                     // DAC0
00287       /* assume -10V..+10V range */
00288       d = ((user_data.dac0 + 10) / 20) * 0x1000;
00289       if (d >= 0x1000)
00290          d = 0x0FFF;
00291 
00292 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00293       DAC0H = d >> 8;
00294       DAC0L = d & 0xFF;
00295 #endif
00296 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00297       DAC0L = d & 0xFF;
00298       DAC0H = d >> 8;
00299 #endif
00300       break;
00301 
00302    case 9:                     // DAC1
00303       /* assume -10V..+10V range */
00304       d = ((user_data.dac1 + 10) / 20) * 0x1000;
00305       if (d >= 0x1000)
00306          d = 0x0FFF;
00307 
00308 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00309       DAC1H = d >> 8;
00310       DAC1L = d & 0xFF;
00311 #endif
00312 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00313       DAC1L = d & 0xFF;
00314       DAC1H = d >> 8;
00315 #endif
00316       break;
00317 
00318    case 10:                    // p1 
00319       P1 = user_data.p1;
00320       break;
00321 
00322    case 11:                    // adc_average
00323       if (user_data.adc_average > 8)
00324          user_data.adc_average = 8;
00325       break;
00326 
00327    case 12:                    // set bipolar/unipoar
00328       UNI_BIP = (user_data.range[0] & 0x04) > 0;
00329 
00330       for (i = 1; i < 8; i++) {
00331          if (UNI_BIP)
00332             user_data.range[i] |= 0x04;
00333          else
00334             user_data.range[i] &= ~0x04;
00335       }
00336 
00337       break;
00338    }
00339 
00340    if (index >= 12)
00341       gain_flag = 1;
00342 }
00343 
00344 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00345 
00346 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00347 {
00348    if (index == 10)
00349       user_data.p1 = P1;
00350 
00351    return 0;
00352 }
00353 
00354 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00355 
00356 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00357 {
00358    /* echo input data */
00359    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00360    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00361    return 2;
00362 }
00363 
00364 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00365 
00366 void adc_read(channel, float *d)
00367 {
00368    unsigned long value;
00369    unsigned int i, n;
00370    float gvalue;
00371 
00372    AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00373    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00374 
00375    n = 1 << (user_data.adc_average + 4);
00376 
00377    value = 0;
00378    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00379       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00380 
00381       ADCINT = 0;
00382       ADBUSY = 1;
00383       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00384 
00385       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00386 
00387       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00388       yield();
00389    }
00390 
00391    if (user_data.adc_average)
00392       value >>= (user_data.adc_average);
00393 
00394    /* convert to volts */
00395    gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 2.5;
00396 
00397    /* correct for channel offset in mV for a gain of 10 */
00398    gvalue += user_data.ofs[channel] / 10000.0;
00399 
00400    /* correct for channel gain up to +- 1.28 % */
00401    gvalue *= (1 + user_data.gain[channel] / 10000.0);
00402 
00403    /* subtract 1V for bipolar mode */
00404    if (user_data.range[channel] & 0x04)
00405       gvalue = gvalue - 1;
00406 
00407    /* correct for bipolar offset */
00408 //##   if (user_data.range[channel] & 0x04)
00409 //##      gvalue += user_data.bip_ofs[channel] / 1000.0;
00410 
00411    /* external voltage divider */
00412    gvalue *= 10;
00413 
00414    /* external PGA */
00415    switch (user_data.range[channel] & 0x03) {
00416    case 0x00:
00417       gvalue /= 1.0;
00418       break;
00419    case 0x01:
00420       gvalue /= 10.0;
00421       break;
00422    case 0x02:
00423       gvalue /= 100.0;
00424       break;
00425    case 0x03:
00426       gvalue /= 1000.0;
00427       break;
00428    }
00429 
00430    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00431    *d = gvalue;
00432    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00433 }
00434 
00435 void user_loop(void)
00436 {
00437    static unsigned char i = 0;
00438 
00439    adc_read(i, &user_data.adc[i]);
00440    i = (i + 1) % 8;
00441 
00442    if (gain_flag) {
00443       gain_flag = 0;
00444       write_gain();
00445    }
00446 }
